EmailTemplate.name: Illinois APCO 2011.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Illinois Public Safety Telecommunications Association- See You At the TriTech Booth #102!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
See You There l October 16 - 18 l Springfield, IL Illinois Public Safety Telecommunications Association
Stop by and see us next week at the Illinois Public Safety Telecommunications Association Conference (IPSTA) in Springfield, Illinois. Visit TriTech Booth #102 to learn more about how our CAD and Mobile solutions are helping our clients reshape the way they manage information.
Enter to Win a Public Safety Monopoly Game at the TriTech Booth.
Share this message with colleagues or visit us at www.tritech.com
This email was sent by TriTech Software Systems
9860 Mesa Rim Road l San Diego, CA 92121
